content: spekjes is a no-sew beginner crochet pattern the best thing about it if you make several you can stack them on top of each other i used james c brett flutterby chunky yarn and a 4mm hook and my finished amigurumi is about 11 x 6 5 cm in size feel free to use any other yarn you might like this pattern can be used both for chenille and regular yarn you can sell products made from this pattern but please do credit me in the product description my instagram handle is @edgar_the_octopus i d love to see your makes please do not steal sell or claim this pattern as your own feel free to message me on instagram if you have any questions
